an6.113:1.5: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, tinnam dhammanam pahanaya tayo dhamma bhavetabba.
an6.113:1.7: Aratiya pahanaya mudita bhavetabba, vihimsaya pahanaya avihimsa bhavetabba, adhammacariyaya pahanaya dhammacariya bhavetabba.
an6.113:1.8: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, tinnam dhammanam pahanaya ime tayo dhamma bhavetabba”ti.
